name: Iron (ferrous sulfate)

avoid_foods.timing: Avoid 1 hour before and 2 hours after

warnings: May cause constipation; consult doctor if pregnant

name: Simvastatin

avoid_foods.why: Increases blood levels of statins; risk of muscle toxicity

warnings: Report unexplained muscle pain or weakness immediately

name: Warfarin

avoid_foods.item: Large amounts of leafy green vegetables
avoid_foods.why: High vitamin K can reduce effect of warfarin

warnings: Monitor INR regularly; consult physician before diet changes

name: Metronidazole

avoid_foods.why: Can cause severe nausea, flushing, palpitations (disulfiram-like reaction)
avoid_foods.timing: Avoid alcohol during treatment and 48 hours after

warnings: Do not drink alcohol while on this medicine

name: Levothyroxine

avoid_foods.timing: Take on an empty stomach; wait 3-4 hours after calcium

warnings: Take consistently at same time each day
